attributes.action: SUPPORT and IMPLEMENT the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy. It's about time the 'petrolheads' were punished. Well done Mr.Blair!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The persons signing this petition fully support The Prime Minister in his endeavours to bring in a vehicle tracking and road pricing policy. It will reduce the daily death and carnage on our nations roads and reduce harmful pollution to the environment so that me may leave a better planet for our children and grandchildren.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "SUPPORT and IMPLEMENT the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy. It's about time the 'petrolheads' were punished. Well done Mr.Blair!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11108.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/proroadpricing/
